common.questions: If you have any questions, you can contact us:
pageNotFound.heading: Page not found
pageNotFound.paragraph1: If you typed the web address, check it is correct.
pageNotFound.paragraph2: If you pasted the web address, check you copied the entire address.
pageNotFound.paragraph3: If the web address is correct or you selected a link or button, you can contact us:
unhandledException.paragraph1: You'll be able to use the service again later.
haveYourSayJourney.title: Sorry, there's a problem with the service
haveYourSayJourney.paragraph2: We have not saved your answers.
haveYourSayJourney.paragraph3: When the service is available, you'll have to start again.
